Reading through these comments, I see a remarkable socio-cultural clash theme emerging between the US and... the Dutch! The US expresses a sense of entitlement to sit in judgement on all local matters for debate, while demanding moral superiority over those it finds wanting. The Dutch simply react with an even deeper sense of underlying arrogance and apathetic cynicism.
